title: PT Farm, LLC Recalls Beef Products Due To Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: The following recall release was updated July 28, 2016 to reflect additional epidemiological and traceback information developed since the initial release. WASHINGTON, July 26, 2016 PT Farm, LLC, a North Haverhill, N.H. establishment, is recalling approximately 8,800 pounds of raw beef products that...
